New Records: Ireland achieved their first T20I win against South Africa.
Key Match Events: Ross Adair smashed a century to lead the Irish batting efforts.
Graham Hume starred with a three-wicket haul.
South Africa captain Aiden Markram won the toss and decided to bowl first.
Patrick Kruger took a four-wicket haul in the first match.
Ryan Rickelton scored 76 from 48 deliveries in the first match.
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa entered the series after a 0-3 T20I whitewash to West Indies and a historic ODI series loss to Afghanistan.
Ireland was playing their first T20 tournament after a disappointing World Cup campaign.
